resources.string:
AsciiCam 1.0
Â© 2012 Brian Nenninger
More info: www.dozingcatsoftware.com/AsciiCam

Comments and bug reports: bnenning@gmail.com

Source Code: https://github.com/dozingcat/AsciiCam

Touch the screen to switch between color and black and white modes. To take a picture, touch the shutter icon in the upper left. The smaller icons under the shutter in order are:
- Settings: Allows you to change the characters used to display the image.
- Gallery: Shows a list of all the pictures you've taken. Touch an image to view it full screen, where you will have the option to delete it, or share it as an image or as HTML.
- Switch Camera: Switches between rear and front facing cameras. This is only available on Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) or later.
You have not saved any pictures yet.
Characters for black and white mode.
Enter characters to use in images from darkest to brightest, or leave blank for the default of .:oO8@
Enter characters to use in images from darkest to brightest, or leave blank for the default of .:oO8@
Enter characters to use in images from darkest to brightest. Full color mode usually works best with fewer or even just one character. Leave blank for default of O8@
